attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This triathlon has caused much disruption for ourselves, as we live on the route of the triathlon, we are unable to go out as all the roads are closed, Salford Council have taken no notice of the residents views and opinions, shops are losing business and people are made to stay in their house as they are unable to go out in their car, an utter disgrace.
